Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Logically \Log"ic*al*ly\, adv. In a logical manner; as, to argue logically. [1913 Webster]
logically adv 1: according to logical reasoning; "logically, you should now do the same to him" 2: in a logical manner; "he acted logically under the circumstances" [ant: {illogically}]
